meanings.definition: A type of printer that uses inkjets to produce images or text on paper.
meanings.sent1: My new printer with inkjets is so fast!
meanings.sent2: I need to buy more ink for my inkjets.
meanings.sent3: The inkjets in the printer seem to never run out!
meanings.sent4: The inkjets danced across the paper, leaving a trail of color.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors from the inkjets made the picture come to life.

meanings.definition: The act of printing using an inkjet printer.
meanings.sent1: I love the quality of the inkjets on this paper.
meanings.sent2: The inkjets on this document are smudged.
meanings.sent3: The inkjets on the paper formed a secret message.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed from the inkjets like a river of thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The inkjets hummed softly as they worked their magic on the page.
